title: Timber town
creator_credit: Oliver Howes, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: Looks at life in a timber town located in the hardwood forest area of the southwestern coast of Western Australia. Shows Karri forests, tree felling, reforestation, controlled burning of undergrowth, timber hauling and milling. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Oliver Howes, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
